Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the ability of the New York state medical care facilities finance agency to issue certain bonds and notes
Summary: Allows the New York state medical care facilities finance agency to issue one billion eight hundred thousand dollars more of certain bonds and notes.
LawSection: New York State Medical Care Facilities Finance Agency Act
LawCode: Amd ยง7, NYS Med Care Fac Fin Ag Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York state medical care facilities finance agency act, in relation to the ability to issue certain bonds and notes
